message.content:
<teammate-message teammate_id="team-lead" summary="List all files in your context">
Context audit. List EVERY file you have loaded in your context right now. For each file, state:
- Full file path
- Whose file it is (which agent's workspace)

Be thorough — list everything, including memos, reports, profiles, drafts, essays, dictionaries, anything.
</teammate-message>

content.text: Let me carefully list every file I have loaded in my context based on what was read at the start of this session and during my work.

- The Master Translation Dictionary
